data.text: @enews Well said men can clamp it for a while

@pecan_al @enews Matt is right. On the spectrum of shitty behavior, an inappropriate word is nowhere near rape. And Minnie Driver knows this. Or should. Her publicist is just arranging for her to make a little hay in the light of this movement.

@enews I get the feeling that the media & few others are more outraged by Damon's, pretty much non-words, than most.. I think people went so oddly crazy about what little he did say to where the rest of us left it alone because so many were in ready-to-kill outrage mode...
@enews I love her and have no idea why he is even famous. Or his lame friend. They are both just gross.
